          <title>
            <string language="sl">Propad rimskega imperija</string>
            <string language="en">Downfall of roman empire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sturz des römischen Reiches</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chute de l'empire romain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Downfall do império roman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rovina dell'impero romano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πτώση της ρωμαϊκής αυτοκρατορίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caída del imperio romano</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">PowerPoint predstavitev za spoznavanje glavnih vzrokov in posledic propada rimskega imperija.</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of main reasons and consequences for downfall of roman empire.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">rimski imperij</string>
            <string language="en">roman empire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">propad</string>
            <string language="en">downfall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">barbar</string>
            <string language="en">barbarian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">suženj</string>
            <string language="en">slave</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung von Hauptgründen und von 
Konsequenzen für Sturz des römischen Reiches.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation des raisons principales et des 
conséquences pour la chute de l'empire romain.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação de razões principais e de 
conseqüências para o downfall do império roman.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione dei motivi principali e delle 
conseguenze per la rovina dell'impero romano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση των βασικών λόγων και των συνεπειών για την
πτώση της ρωμαϊκής αυτοκρατορίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de razones principales y de 
consecuencias para la caída del imperio romano.</string>
          </description>
